erp-api-background.description: If a URL value is provided, then API endpoint will be queued and executed in background. When the execution of the background operation is finished, the system will POST the response to the specified URL. The endpoint itself responds in this case with a 202-Accepted status and a reference to a state document for the background operation.

$block: This class represents a Warehouse in WarehouseController. Used for getting data.

$ul: **active**: The top part > Active > This check box indicates (if selected) that the warehouse is active.
**address**: Address information tab > Address section >
**addressId**: Information retrieved from the system.
**addressLine1**: Address ! > The first line in the address of the warehouse.
**addressLine2**: Address 2 > The second line in the warehouse address.
**addressType**: Information retrieved from the system.
**city**: City > The city of the warehouse address.
**country**: Country > The country where the warehouse is located.
**errorInfo**
**id**: Mandatory field: Country ID* > The unique two-letter country ID according to international standard ISO 3166.
**metadata**
**maxPageSize**
**totalCount**
**name**: Mandatory field: Country name* > The complete name of the country.
**county**: County > The county where the warehouse is located.
**id**: Click the magnifier > The identifier
**name**: Click the magnifier > The displayed name
**postalCode**: Postcode > The postcode relevant for the warehouse address.
**validated**: Information retrieved from the system.
**avgDefaultCost**: The top part > Avg. default return cost > For items with the Average valuation method, the option that defines which of costs should be used for returns and receipts.
**branch**: Mandatory field: The top part > Branch* > The branch associated with the company.
**name**: Click the magnifier. > The name.
**number**: Click the magnifier. > The identifier.
**contact**: Address information tab > Contact section >
**attention**: Attention > The department or person to be noted on the attention line, if this line is used by your company.
**companyName**: Company name > The legal business name of the warehouse to appear on the documents.
**contactId**: Information retrieved from the system.
**email**: Email > The email address of the contact person assigned to this warehouse.
**fax**: Fax > The fax number of the contact person assigned to this warehouse.
**phone1**: Phone 1 > The primary phone number of the contact person assigned to this warehouse.
**phone2**: Phone 2 > 	A secondary phone number of the contact person assigned to this warehouse.
**web**: Web > The URL of the web page where information about the warehouse is published.
**description**: The top part > Description > A brief description of the warehouse.
**dropShipLocation**: Location table tab > Drop-ship location > The warehouse location used to account for drop shipments.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**fifoDefaultCost**: The top part > FIFO default returns cost > For items with the FIFO valuation method, the option that defines which of costs should be used for returns and receipts.
**locationEntry**: The top part > Location entry > An option indicating whether warehouse locations can be added directly on any inventory document or only by using this window.
**locations**: Location table tab > The location table >

**lockSitePICountEntry**: The top part > Freeze the inventory when the stocktaking is in data entry state > This check box indicates (if selected) that the inventory in the warehouse will be frozen during the stocktaking and data entry stages of stocktaking.
**receiptLocation**: Location table tab > Receiving location > The warehouse location to be used to receive goods.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**replenishmentClass**: The top part > Replenishment class > The replenishment class associated with this warehouse.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**returnLocation**: Location table tab > RMA location > The RMA warehouse location.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**shipLocation**: Location table tab > Shipping location > The warehouse location to be used to ship goods.
**description**: Click on the magnifier. > The description.
**id**: Click on the magnifier. > The identifier.
**warehouseID**: Mandatory field: The top part > Warehouse ID* > The unique ID of the warehouse.
**stateLocation**
